title: Michel Barnier to be rewarded with role in EU-UK trade talks after Brexit
text:
Michel Barnier is set to be rewarded for his work negotiating the Brexit deal with a senior role in the upcoming trade negotiations between Britain and the EU.

The EU’s chief negotiator, is lined up to work with Phil Hogan, the incoming trade commissioner under Ursula von der Leyen, who will succeed Jean-Claude Juncker as president of the European Commission in the coming months.

The decision is designed to quell fears among countries such as France that Mr Hogan, who is Irish, could be tempted to go easy on Britain in the trade talks because it would be to Dublin’s advantage to strike a trade deal.

“It makes sense to have a French guy like Michel Barnier keeping an eye on the trade negotiations...
description: Michel Barnier is set to be rewarded for his work negotiating the Brexit deal with a senior role in the upcoming trade negotiations between Britain and the EU.
